div.h2: Interested in Montana Tech? Visit us virtually!

div.div: Elevating Education Explore Butte, Montana's beautiful architecture, abundant recreational opportunities, and vibrant city with the most friendly people you will find anywhere. Learn about Butte

img.alt: Montana Tech is a top STEM school in the U.S.

div.p: Named #6 STEM university in the U.S.

img.alt: top university in Montana for earning potential

div.p: For Earning Potential
University for Advancing America's Economy
10-Year annual average placement rate for graduating seniors
Median Starting Salary for Graduates in the School of Mines & Engineering 2016

From our tight-knit community of high-achieving students and world-renowned faculty to our spectacular location in the heart of the Rocky Mountains—we promise you won’t find another place like Montana Technological University, or a better place to call home.

The education students receive at Montana Tech extends far beyond what is taught in the classroom, providing graduates with the knowledge and skills needed for a successful career and the opportunity to lead extraordinary lives.
Montana Tech is renowned for producing sought after graduates in areas ranging from engineering, science, and energy to health care, information sciences, and technology.

a.title: Bachelor Level

div.p: Continue your studies in an advanced degree where personal instruction and hands on learning are a hallmark.

a.title: Graduate School

div.a: Graduate Level Studies at Montana Tech

div.p: Want marketable skills in a short amount of time? Certificates and Associate Degrees allow you to enter the workforce in two years or less.

a.title: Highlands College

div.a: Earn a Certificate or Associate Degree

div.p: Montana Tech’s faculty and students conduct ground breaking researching in our special focus of science and engineering.

a.title: Research

div.p: Montana Tech possesses an internationally esteemed, century old tradition of excellence in higher education where students learn in state of the art facilities.

a.title: Future Students
